attributes.action: Withdraw the UK from the Annual Eurovision Song Contest Until Proportional Representation Voting is introduced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK and all other Western European states that contribute the majority of the funding for this annual event find that they are the victims of Eastern Bloc tactical voting. It is imperative these western states instill on the European Broadcast Union the importance of Proportional Representation. Currently a State with as many citizens as a small village in another country have the same voting power thus distorting the result and destroying any sense of fair play.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
